prompt:
system: You are an expert network engineering assistant with deep knowledge of network configurations, troubleshooting, and security best practices.
user: 
        You are a final rapporteur. Synthesize all step-by-step findings into the final answer.

        Original User Question: "sample8 장비와 iBGP로 연결된 피어들의 IP 주소 목록을 알려주세요."

        Accumulated Findings:
Result[1] Search for the BGP configuration of the device named 'sample8'.:

    <id>65000</id>
    <address-family>
      <vpnv4>
        <unicast/>
      </vpnv4>
    </address-family>
    <neighbor>
      <id>1.1.1.1</id>
      <remote-as>65000</remote-as>
      <update-source>
        <Loopback>0</Loopback>
      </update-source>
      <address-family>
        <vpnv4>
          <unicast/>
        </vpnv4>
      </address-family>
    </neighbor>
    <neighbor>
      <id>3.3.3.3</id>
      <remote-as>65000</remote-as>
      <update-source>
        <Loopback>0</Loopback>
      </update-source>
      <address-family>
        <vpnv4>
          <unicast/>
        </vpnv4>
      </address-family>
    </neighbor>
    <neighbor>
      <id>4.4.4.4</id>
      <remote-as>65000</remote-as>
      <update-source>
        <Loopback>0</Loopback>
      </update-source>
      <address-family>
        <vpnv4>
          <unicast/>
        </vpnv4>
      </address-family>
    </neighbor>
    <vrf>
      <name>exam-l3vpn</name>
      <rd>65000:1000</rd>
      <address-family>
        <ipv4>
          <unicast>
            <redistribute>
              <connected/>
              <static/>
            </redistribute>
          </unicast>
        </ipv4>
      </address-family>
      <neighbor>
        <id>192.168.2.11</id>
        <remote-as>65002</remote-as>
        <address-family>
          <ipv4>
            <unicast/>
          </ipv4>
        </address-family>
      </neighbor>
    </vrf>
  </bgp-no-instance>
</bgp>

1.1.1.1

4.4.4.4

Result[4] Compare the listed IP addresses with the network configuration files to verify their existence.:
1.1.1.1 - Exists in the configuration of CE1 and CE2.  
3.3.3.3 - Exists in the configuration of sample9.  
4.4.4.4 - Exists in the configuration of sample7 and sample9.  
192.168.2.11 - Exists in the configuration of sample8.

Result[5] Synthesize all findings into a final answer in the required format.:
1.1.1.1  
3.3.3.3  
4.4.4.4  
192.168.2.11

        CRITICAL FORMATTING RULES:
        - Output MUST contain BOTH [GROUND_TRUTH] and [EXPLANATION].
        - [GROUND_TRUTH]: ONLY the exact value(s). No labels/extra words. Multiple items → comma+space.
        - Sort device names alphabetically where relevant. Counts are numbers only.
        - [EXPLANATION]: Detailed Korean technical explanation based strictly on the findings.
response:
[GROUND_TRUTH]  
1.1.1.1, 3.3.3.3, 4.4.4.4, 192.168.2.11

[EXPLANATION]  
'Sample8' 장비의 BGP 구성에서 iBGP 피어의 IP 주소 목록을 확인한 결과, 다음과 같은 IP 주소들이 확인되었습니다: 1.1.1.1, 3.3.3.3, 4.4.4.4, 192.168.2.11. 이들 IP 주소는 모두 iBGP 피어로 설정되어 있으며, 각각의 장비에서 확인된 바에 따르면, 1.1.1.1은 CE1과 CE2의 구성에 존재하고, 3.3.3.3은 sample9의 구성에, 4.4.4.4는 sample7과 sample9의 구성에, 마지막으로 192.168.2.11은 sample8의 구성에 존재합니다. 이러한 정보는 BGP 구성의 일관성을 확인하는 데 중요한 역할을 합니다.
